01320 inline const MimeMessage* 
01321 RouteMessageRequest::getMimeMessage( uint32 index ) const {
01322    if ( index < getNbrMimeMessages() ) {
01323       return m_message[ index ];
01324    } else {
01325       return NULL;
01326    }
01327 }
01328 
01329 
01330 inline uint32 
01331 RouteMessageRequest::getNbrMimeMessages() const {
01332    return m_message.size();
01333 }
01334 
01335 
01336 inline uint32
01337 RouteMessageRequest::getNbrGfxFeatureMapImageRequests() const
01338 {
01339    return (m_nbrImageRequests);
01340 }
01341 
01342 
01343 inline GfxFeatureMapImageRequest*
01344 RouteMessageRequest::getGfxFeatureMapImageRequest( uint32 i ) const
01345 {
01346    if ( i < getNbrGfxFeatureMapImageRequests() ) {
01347       return (m_imageRequests[ i ]);
01348    } else {
01349       return (NULL);
01350    }
01351 }
01352       
01353 
01354 inline uint16 
01355 RouteMessageRequest::getRotationForMap( uint32 i ) const
01356 {
01357    uint16 retVal = 0;
01358    if ( i < m_mapRotationAngles.size() ) {
01359       retVal = m_mapRotationAngles[ i ];
01360    }
01361 
01362    return (retVal);
01363    
01364 }
